entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY, Dempster (Highway)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:08 p.m. MST Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then cloudy. Blowing snow early this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 30 km/h except 70 gusting to 90 near the Richardson mountains early this evening. Wind becoming light near midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Clearing. High 7.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the morning. High 7. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of light snow. Low plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of light snow overnight with risk of freezing rain. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of snow or rain. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of snow or rain. High plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Windy. High plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Clear. Windy. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 30 April 2023
